name: Let there Bee rumours
description:
This is the project made for the 34th GM(48) Game Jam!

The new version has some changes made, according to the feedback we got during the weeks after the Jam ended, so it's the second version of the project. 

It was still our first Game jam game, so we had a lot of fun while doing it.

->https://gm48.net/game/1569/let-there-bee-rumours

Game

You play as a small ant gathering gossip by listening to the various NPC that inhabit the Bee Kingdom.

The objective is simply to get to the end of the level and post the latest rumours on the billboard.

There's no auto-save feature, so if you die you have to start from the beginning.

Instructions

Controls

  • A/D - Movement
  • Space - Jump (hold space for a bigger jump)
  • Esc - Pause
  • R - Restart level
  • X - Exit
  • M - Main Menu

Objective
Get to the end of the level by avoiding obstacles and enemies.

Attributions
